page.title: 16Clubs,Fearn.
page.content: There are few clubs in our area.There are four main ones -Youth Club, Football Club,Old Folks' Club and The Amenities Association.The Youth Club is on a Tuesday from 7-10pm.and costs 10p.You can play table tennis, darts, snooker, pool or swing ball.There are sometimes club competitions.Juice and crisps are on sale there.The club first started on November 6th 1984 and finished for the summer on 4th June 1985.At the Old Folks' Club, people can talk or have a cup of tea.Entertainment is sometimes provided. Fearn Thistle is the local football team. They train on a Tuesday evening.The Amenities Association holds functions throughout the year ,raising funds for the benefit of the Old Folks and the school children.Last year children went to the pantomine at Inverness at Christmas time.
